branchCategory.name: ASP-X369, Speed Control Valve with Pilot Operated Check Valve
branchCategory.description: <p>ASP-X369 is a variant of the ASP series of speed controller with pilot operated check valve that is simply the pilot check function.  It is designed to be directly mounted to the device that is being controlled.  The pressure inlet is a One-touch connection for installation convenience</p>
